name: TNT's Basics in random stuff idk
name_original: TNT's Basics in random stuff idk
description:
New Download Instructions

1: Download Baldis Basics 1.4.3

2: download sharedassets 0-5

3: download Asemblly thing

4: put all sharedassets in BALDI_DATA

5: Replace in Destination

6: put the Assembly thing in the "Managed" folder in BALDI_DATA

7: Replace in Destination

8: play and have fun
